about_the_game:
Add a little romance to your RPG! The Spirit of France tileset will transform your maps into a romantic and classy city for your party to explore.

The Spirit of France tileset includes:

Base tiles – water, grass, dirt, rubble, etc.
2 wood floors
Cobble tile
Concrete and asphalt
2 rugs, one light and one dark
Grass and vine overlays
5 tables – white tablecloth, 2 wood, one plain white table, and one gray with fancy edge
Fallen flower petals
and more!

Walls:

2 wallpaper styles in 5 colors apiece – pale, cream, charcoal, teal and pink
Cobble wall pattern
Wood panels
Shelves
Hedge
Plain painted walls
Autotile windows

Also included:

Stairs to match floors
Lots of plants, with and without pots, and potting supplies like dirt and spade
Various empty pots – add your own plants if you wish!
Floral arrangements
Old-fashioned cash register
Shop goods – Bread, cakes, cheese, wine and more
Coffee shop supplies – cups, machines, bags of coffee, etc
Boutique supplies – perfumes, beauty supplies, clothing, etc
Art studio – art desks, paintings, easels, sketches, supplies, art cart, etc
Fancy furniture and decor – beds, shelves, side-tables, sofa, chairs, lamps, grandfather clock, kitchen, vanity, old-fashioned tub, curtains and more
French doors (with animations)
Windows with several variations – lit and unlit, with curtains, with shutters
Heavy wood doors (with animations)
Lots of elegant carved stone elements to decorate your older buildings
Fountain (with animation)
Vintage posters
Iron bistro table set
Balcony
Cast-iron lighting
Signage (blank, add your own text)
Eaves
Trees
and more!


Events and Animations

Door animations with lit and unlit interiors – several styles
Fountain, with and without statue

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
